ruleset.name: Apex Structure Rules
ruleset.description: Custom rules for Apex code structure and organization

rule.name: InnerClassesCannotHaveStaticMembers
rule.message: Inner classes cannot have static attributes or methods in Apex. Remove static modifiers from inner class members
rule.description: Inner classes in Apex cannot have static attributes or methods. This is a language limitation - Apex does not support static members in inner classes. Remove static modifiers from inner class members. This is a compilation error that will prevent the code from compiling.
